name: Whispering Forest
description: An ancient forest where the trees seem to murmur secrets to one another.

rooms.name: Forest Edge
rooms.description: The treeline begins here, ancient oaks towering overhead and blotting out much of the sky. Shafts of sunlight pierce the canopy, illuminating patches of moss and wildflowers. The town walls are visible to the south, a reassuring sight as the forest grows denser to the north.

rooms.name: Winding Forest Path
rooms.description: A narrow dirt path winds between massive tree trunks, their bark covered in luminescent moss. Strange birdcalls echo from the canopy above, and the undergrowth rustles with unseen creatures. The path splits ahead, continuing north into deeper woods or branching east toward a break in the trees.

rooms.name: Sunlit Clearing
rooms.description: A peaceful clearing where sunlight streams down unimpeded. Wildflowers carpet the ground in a riot of color, and butterflies dance lazily in the warm air. A fallen log provides a natural resting spot, its surface covered in shelf mushrooms.

rooms.name: Deep Forest
rooms.description: The forest grows thick and primeval here. Gnarled roots break through the earth like the fingers of buried giants, and the canopy is so dense that only a dim green twilight reaches the forest floor. The air is cool and damp, heavy with the scent of earth and decay.

rooms.name: Forest Stream
rooms.description: A crystal-clear stream burbles over smooth stones, cutting a gentle path through the forest floor. Ferns and water plants line the banks, and small silver fish dart in the shallows. The sound of running water is calming after the oppressive silence of the deep woods.

npcs.name: Shadow Wolf
npcs.description: A large wolf with fur as dark as midnight. Its amber eyes gleam with predatory intelligence, and wisps of shadow seem to cling to its form as it stalks silently through the undergrowth.

npcs.name: Giant Forest Spider
npcs.description: A massive spider the size of a large dog, its chitinous body mottled green and brown for camouflage. Thick webs trail from its spinnerets, and venom glistens on its fangs.
